title: The Auction Book 2: BDSM Auction Block Rough Erotic Short Story: Husband Loans Wife, Cheating Punishment, Taboo, Hardcore BDSM
description: Juniper is caught having an affair by her husband Max with his best friend and when he confronts her about it, he lays down the law. If she can have an affair behind his back for four months, the least she can do it is have an affair in front of his face.Enter Max's best friend, their potting shed--and a bargain is struck.Nothing from the wicked, degrading, sensual night will ever leave her brain. Juniper will be sure to include her husband in all of her other affairs from now until forever.
author: Elena K. Salvatore
